title: Kai Xuan
author: Kai Xuan
content: I watched Brazil match today and I am impressed with the game. But I thought Neymar  would score for Brazil. His kinda a big shot.

comments.author: Lily Lai
comments.body: Its sad actually Neymar couldn't play because of his injury so don't think that he can't score. Pity that guy

comments.author: Kenny Tan
comments.body: Casemiro is the MVP of the match. Thank god we win. Betted on Brazil using BK8 and won huge hahah

comments.author: Lily Lai
comments.body: Let's pray for Neymar recovering.  Btw you are using BK8 to bet?

comments.author: Kai Xuan
comments.body: He got injured!! OMG I didn't know   I only watched the highlight

comments.body: Quote from: Lily Lai on November 29, 2022, 05:18:44 PMLet's pray for Neymar recovering.  Btw you are using BK8 to bet?Yes. They user friendly and have beginner bonus. You can try it out  It easy to use
